scripts.build: if [ "$BUILD_TARGET" = "hono" ]; then npm run backend:build; else npm run frontend:build; fi
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build:full: npm run backend:build && npm run frontend:build
scripts.backend:build: cd backend-hono && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run backend:test && npm run frontend:test
scripts.lint: npm run backend:lint && npm run frontend:lint
scripts.typecheck: npm run backend:typecheck && npm run frontend:typecheck
